amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any funds appropriated for the Former Soviet Union Threat Reduction program from being used to build housing for members of the military forces of the former Soviet Union or for current or former members of the military forces of the Russian Federation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment preprinted in the Congressional Record of August 3 as amendment No. 74, to require that none of the funds appropriated in this bill to be used for the housing expenses of any individual who was a member of the military forces of the Soviet Union or the Russian Federation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Callahan amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
